texts.text: Additional functionality: Malthael can interact with dead bodies destroying their souls
subtexts: This interaction means skills like <modified, abilities, heroic, 0, auriel> and <modified, talents, 13, 1, guldan> can't be used as it will destroy the soul

texts.text: Additional functionality: Malthael receive 2% extra experience in the end of the game everytime he participates on a Nephalem takedown and 1% for other humans

general.developerCommentary: I want to make him closer to the Aspect of Death role and also make it closer to the lore.

texts.text: Additional functionality: Instantly kill troops while under <modified, abilities, trait, 0> effect. Setting it's cooldown to 0.25 and refunding mana if a troop was the primary target.
Additional functionality: While mounted increase mana regeneration by 300%.
Additional functionality: Each Time Malthael go through an unit he gains a charge of dodge that lasts 3 seconds.
subtexts: Won't gain charges if he goes through the same unit

texts.text: Moved from level 7
Moved from level 13
Moved to level 7
Moved to level 7
Moved from level 4
Moved from level 4
Additional functionality: Receive 15 phsyical armor while one enemy hero is affected by <modified, abilities, trait, 0>

changes.name: <modified, talents, 7, 2>

texts.text: Activate to fear enemies close to Malthael for 1.25 seconds after 0.25 seconds. Recharges after Enemy heroes affected by <modified, abilities, trait, 0> healed a total of 2000
subtexts: Radius will be 2 | <vanilla, abilities, basic, 1, muradin> is 3.0
Works similar to <vanilla, talents, 4, 2, genji> in terms of cooldown needing to recharge doing X thing.

changes.developerCommentary: I really don't know which number to put on the recharge.

texts.text: Moved to level 13
Quest removed
Additional functionality: Heal 100% of the damage dealt
Moved from level 7
Healing reduction increased from 50% to 75%
Changed functionality: Activate to after 2 seconds, Steal 15 spell armor from each enemy Hero affliected by <modified, abilities, trait, 0> for 4 seconds.
subtexts: Stealing will subtract the armor from affect heroes and give it to Malthael.

texts.text: Moved from level 4
Additional functionality: <modified, abilities, basic, 0> increase the current <modified, abilities, trait, 0> damage by 10% each time it hits the enemy.
subtexts: The damage will be independent meaning one target could be receiving extra 70% damage from the passive and other could be receiving only 10%.

texts.text: Additional functionality: Damages and applies <modified, abilities, trait, 0> to enemies around its target.

Additional functionality: Enemy heros that die next to Malthael grants him essence of death. Activate to use a charge of Essence of death decreasing every respawn time by 7% of it's current time for each charge.
subtexts: The minimum time this will decrease will be 1 second.

texts.text: Additional functionality: <modified, abilities, heroic, 0> steals 1% maximum health of every hero on the area each second. Lasts 4 seconds
subtexts: The maximum health from given heroes will be decreased and given to Malthael effectively stealing their maximum health
The health stolen will be returned in one go to the stolen heroes, if Malthael stole 4%Â¨maximum health points from a Diablo after 4 seconds all the maximum health will be returned in one go.
The maximum health Malthael steals will come healed meaning if he steals 79 maximum health that health will alredy come healed instead of only increased the maximum health point limit.
The health returned to enemy heroes won't come back healed. Meaning it will only give back the limit health points.

texts.text: Changed functionality: Activate while dead to immediately respawn at the Hall of Storms.
subtexts: Cooldown: Takedown an enemy hero with <modified, abilities, heroic, 1> within 5 seconds of it being used

texts.text: Additional functionality: While on the trail extends it's time up to 2 seconds and makes Malthael unkillable
Changed functionality: Malthael traverse through terrain and can't be unmounted by damage
subtexts: This means Malthael will have no collision with terrain.
<vanilla, abilities, basic, 0, diablo> won't be able to stun him anymore and any similar skill that needs terrain to work
Malthael fog vision will completely ignore the current object he stand on. Meaning it will count as if that terrain doensn't exist for fog vision block.
